Full Field Name English: Wake turbulence category identification number minimum weight
Description English: The lower limit of the aircraft maximum takeoff weight for the selected wake turbulence category as defined in Canadian Aviation Regulations, Standard 821.

Full Field Name English: Weight category identification number maximum weight category
Description English: The maximum weight category (the defined uppermost weight limit in the range for the category).
